lines.text: C'mon. Take your best shot!
[Cunningham swings and misses]
No, I said your *best* shot!
[Cunningham swings and misses several times]
Boring!
[Cunningham swings and misses several more times, then gets Cole in the nose]
Is that the *best* you got, boy?
[Cunningham swings and misses]
'Cause if that's the best you got, I'm just gonna have to kill you.

[starts choking Cunningham]
IS *THAT* ALL YOU GOT?
Suffice to say, to the people he hunted for us, he was known as the Glimmer Man. There'd be nothing but jungle, then a glimmer... Then you'd be dead!
Has anybody ever told you you're a real pain in the ass?
All the time.
[Donald points his gun at Cole]
You're not gonna have to hear it anymore. I'm gonna take care of you like I took care of your ex-wife.

You know, when you wake up in the morning and look in the mirror, I think you're probably happy. Pleased at what you see. And that disturbs me. So I'm gonna take it on as my responsibility to make sure that you never get to look in the mirror again.
I woke up happy, I'm goin' to bed happy. 'Cause you're gonna be dead.
[Deverell hears a tape of Smiths conversation with Cole]
I know you're friends with everyone from the postman to the President, but *none* of them will touch you with a ten foot pole once this tape gets out.
What do you want?

Donald. Donald's your trigger-man, right? We want him, not you. You give him to us in a pretty pink bow and the murder weapon. I take it from there. You take the tape. My name gets clean. Your name stays clean. Everyone's happy. Agreed?
Done.

[picks up the phone]
Yeah.
[Cole and Deverell's conversation is played on a tape]
Sounds like your ass just got sold down the river, shit-head!
[a confrontation between Deverell, Donald, and the mob]
How Shakespearian!
To be, or...

[shoots Deverell]
... NOT TO BE!
[Donald ends up impaled to an iron gate in a crucifix position]
I don't think you'll be waking up happy now.

[regarding a dead Russian woman]
What else do you see?
She's got nice tits.
Exactly. But I think a little *too* nice.
[takes a scalpel and cuts open the woman's breast, removing a gel-filled implant with a serial number on it]
Okay, partner. Run this number.
What would cause something like that?
What am I? The Amazing Randi? We have tests to run. It will take time.
Have you seen Casablanca?
You're asking me, have I seen Casablanca?
Have you?
A guy like me, not seen Casablanca?
Well have you?
No.
He's selling it to a bunch of Serbian freedom fighters.
You mean terrorists.
Semantics. You say tomato...
No, motherfucker, I didn't say tomato, I said terrorists.
Once and a while you should cry because it cleanses the soul and you can use a little bit of that.
If I need a cleansing, I'll have a bran muffin.
You sell roaches? Damn, I'm in the wrong business! I could make money and never leave my apartment.
It's called a mala. Tibetan pray beads.
What do you use 'em for?
I use 'em to calm my mind and to purify my thoughts.
Yeah, I use Jack Daniels!
See now, we're trying to go to same place. We're just using different technique.
Except I don't wear the bottle around my neck!
That's because you'd lose your job if you did...
Do you speak Russian?
A little bit.
[Campbell starts banging the suspect's head to the trunk of the car]
Answer, god damn mother fucker! Or I'll beat the shit out of your dumb ass!
You speak good Russian!
Yes, black Russian!
Look, why don't we just get you some red boots and a cape, so you can fly around the city and stop ALL the crime!

[Campbell is shot through a window but catches the ledge on his way down. Cole brings him a rope from the roof]
Hang on, Jim!
Good idea, Jack! I wouldn't have thought of that!
[Cole grabs him and they crash through an old lady's window]
Police business, ma'am. The elevator was broken.
If you'll excuse me I have to get back to the nineties now.

[Having been shot in the foot, and then his left hand, Cole holds the gun up to his right hand]
Jack! Now, Jack-Jack... I-I need that hand, Jack, I need that hand, Jack!
You know I will. Right about n...
Alright! Alright! Game over!
[a beat]
God, I've missed you, Jack! So many young men today just won't go that extra mile.

[as Cole and Campbell are leaving]
Gentlemen, leave us not forget that matter of the ambulance.
I only shot you in one foot. Hobble to a hospital!

[Cole has deftly shot and wounded Smith, while trying to obtain information that can clear Jack of several recent murders]
You're a fucking' psycho! Campbell, *you're* still a cop! Aren't you going to help?
Okay...
[pulls a gun on Smith]
But I'm a really bad shot.
[Cole stops him]
Just trying to help you, Jack.
[after Cole jumps through a window with Johnny]
I love you, Johnny!

[winded]
I love you too... ugh...
I love you too. I hate this job.
